description: Users may notice that unauthorized actions are being performed on their systems, leading to elevated privileges that should not be obtainable. This can manifest as unexpected access to restricted files or functions within the operating system, indicating a potential breach in user permissions. Systems affected include Windows 10 builds 19041, 19045, 22621, and Windows 11 builds 22631, with updates provided in KB articles KB-5033375, KB-5033372, and KB-5033369 to address these issues.
